name: Recycle Hero
description:
Recycle hero is game about recycle junk arround your house, then you can change to super mode for faster separate junk

Control :  Keyboard arrow for separate each junk and Space when in super mode

This game is created for gamejam in dicoding for 1 week with theme is education and for mobile :( , we really confused about education game, the only idea we can come up is this game :D 

Any feedback is greatly appreciated :D
